original_title: We are Not Having Any Trouble in Our Department Despite What You've Heard
overview: Artist and filmmaker Jonn Herschend offers a delightful musing on the emotional agendas that often underlie professional relationships. A promotional video for a Danish art museum in which the spokeswoman discusses the evolution of the museum turns into a literal battle over a failed relationship and the abduction of her cat. The cool modernism of the museum provides an ironic backdrop to the childish behavior of the production team
title: We are Not Having Any Trouble in Our Department Despite What You've Heard
